app.name: GigSy
app.tagline: Connecting people who need help with those who can offer it

hero.title: Search/Post any service in your community
hero.subtitle: fast, secure, efficient
hero.selectAction: Select what you want to do
hero.whatServiceSearch: What service are you looking for?
hero.whatServicePost: What service do you want to post?
hero.whyChooseDesc: The most reliable platform to connect with quality services and verified professionals.

features.verifiedDesc: All service providers pass a verification process to ensure your safety.
features.qualityDesc: A transparent rating system helps you choose the best professional.
features.fastDesc: Find immediate help from people in your local community.
features.protectedDesc: Your payment is held securely until you confirm the service is complete.

community.title: A Community That Grows Together
community.subtitle: More than a platform, we are a network of neighbors helping neighbors. Connect, collaborate, and thrive.

step1.title: Connect Locally
step1.description: Find trusted people in your own neighborhood ready to help or hire.

step2.title: Collaborate & Share
step2.description: Exchange skills and services to solve daily challenges together.

step3.title: Grow Together
step3.description: Build lasting relationships and strengthen your local economy.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Getting help or starting to earn is easier than ever. Follow these simple steps.

step1.title: 1. Search or Post
step1.description: Describe the service you need or create your profile to offer your skills.

step2.title: 2. Connect & Schedule
step2.description: Receive offers from professionals or job opportunities and schedule the details.

step3.title: 3. Get It Done
step3.description: Complete the service and handle payments securely through the platform.

hero.title: Get Your Daily Tasks Done, Fast and Easy.
hero.subtitle: The simplest way to find trusted help for your needs, or to earn money by offering your services.
hero.imageAlt: A person receiving a package from a service provider

findService.title: Find the Help You Need, Instantly.
findService.subtitle: From home repairs to personal errands, connect with skilled professionals in your area ready to help.
findService.imageAlt: A person looking at a list of services on their phone

offerService.title: Earn Money Your Way.
offerService.subtitle: Turn your skills into income. GigSy gives you the flexibility to work when you want, where you want.
offerService.benefit2: Choose the services you want to offer

finalCta.title: Ready to Join the GigSy Community?
finalCta.subtitle: Whether you're looking for help or looking to earn, your community is waiting for you.

form.services: What type of services can you offer?
form.location: In which district do you work?
form.title: Title

success.help: Thank you. We will contact you soon with someone who can help you.
success.earn: Thank you. We will notify you when we have a request for you.

payment.title: Secure payment
payment.secure: The payment will be held in a secure wallet until you confirm that the service has been completed satisfactorily.

profile.switchInfo: Don't worry, you can switch between both profiles at any time from the application.

register.title: Create an account
register.subtitle: Register to get started
register.uploadClickOrDrag: Click to upload or drag and drop
register.uploadDragOrClick: Drag and drop a file here or click to select
register.getCertificateLink: Get your background certificate for free here

login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: We're here to help you
help.description: Here you can get assistance with platform-related issues or with other users.

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.noServices: No services scheduled for this date

how.title: How does it work?
how.step1desc: Create your profile as a requester or service provider.
how.step2desc: Request help or receive notifications of available jobs.
how.step3desc: Perform the service, receive payment, and leave a review.

request.title: Find immediate help
request.subtitle: Tell us what kind of help you need to find the right person.

oferente.title: Service information
oferente.subtitle: Tell us what services you can offer and your availability
